value.title: StarCraft 2: INCREDIBLE GAME - Reynor vs ByuN!
value.excerpt: One of the best games of StarCraft 2 I've seen so far this year. Some might even refer to it as one of the games of the year but I would never say such a thing. This is a Terran versus Zerg between ByuN and Reynor where practically the entire map mines out of Minerals and Vespene Gas.  Support my work
